title: Accessibility problems - Bug 12398
description: I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame.)
OB: When launching the Help view on 20020326, Win2K, the tab key does not respond or navigate within the view.
EB: The tab key should function as expected when the Help view is launched, allowing users to navigate through interactive elements without the need for a preliminary click.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch the application on Windows 2000 (Win2K).
2. Navigate to the Help view.
3. Attempt to use the tab key to navigate within the Help view.

Expected Behavior:
The tab key should respond, allowing users to navigate through interactive elements without the need for a preliminary click.
